ComicInfo.Title: Cubist Be Bop Comics; Girls Girls Girls; Down at the Neighborhood Bar; Comical Comics; The Many Faces of R. Crumb; Women Troubles; Forky O'Donnell; Harvard "Schpitzel" Yale; Sunday Afternoon; Nut Factory Blues
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 22:31:38. [CVDB309454] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 18:06:02. [Issue ID 277181]
ComicInfo.Writer: Robert Crumb,R. Crumb,C. Crumb,Robert Crumb,R. Crumb,C. Crumb
ComicInfo.Characters: Boingy Baxter,John Q. Public,Bo Bo Bolinski
ComicInfo.Summary:
Random is the word in this series of completely unconnected panels.
Yet another series of complete random occurrences thrown together.
Crumb draws several different versions of himself.
Donny visits Fuzzy at the mental institution.
Crumb offers a few dozen new follow up phrases to his "Keep on Truckin.'"
